verbose_text: Although previous studies indicate that the acetylation of PEPCK1 activates the interaction between PEPCK1 and UBR5 and thus leads to the ubiquitination of PEPCK1, the crystal structure of PEPCK1 clearly shows that the potential acetylation sites (Lys70 / Lys71 and Lys594) of PEPCK1 are located as far as possible within the protein.
evidence: PEPCK1 activates the interaction between PEPCK1 and UBR5 and thus leads to the ubiquitination of PEPCK1
